entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:54 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.4°C

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
